About Me

Ayush Pradhan

Hello there, Welcome to my portfolio! I am a graduate student in Computer Science at SUNY Binghamton University. I am fascinated by artificial intelligence and would be delighted to work with you on any intriguing project. I have a year of professional Data Analyst experience in the business as an Intern. Academically, I prefer conducting research in order to investigate and validate new concepts. If you want to talk about my work, connect with me on Linkedin. In my spare time, I enjoy swimming and listening to music.

Developed two AI projects implementing OpenAI technologies that assisted our company's breakthrough into the AI market. The first project was an AI QA bot that can answer queries and offer summaries based on the Indian Constitution, and the second was an AI Diet bot that recommends tailored diet regimens.

As an intern, I worked on two machine learning projects, one aimed at predicting the yearly amount spent by users on an e-commerce platform using features such as time spent on the application and website, length of membership, and others, and the other aimed at predicting house prices in the USA using features such as area income, number of rooms, and age of house.
